HediffDef.label: Thermal Pumped Frame
HediffDef.description: A combat-rated plasteel chassis frame designed to act as a purely military upgrade to the Guardian frame. Luciferium infused mechanite antifreeze is continuously circulated through microchannels to offer superlative temperature protection in combat situations.

ThingDef.label: Thermal Pumped Frame
ThingDef.description: A combat-rated plasteel chassis frame designed to act as a purely military upgrade to the Guardian frame. Luciferium infused mechanite antifreeze is continuously circulated through microchannels to offer superlative temperature protection in combat situations.

RecipeDef.label: Install Thermal Pumped Frame
RecipeDef.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a mechanite circulating thermal frame, enhancing combat capability in extreme temperatures.

HediffDef.label: Martial Frame
HediffDef.description: A combat-rated plasteel chassis frame designed to act as a purely military upgrade to the Mobility frame. It is, in all martial respects, a directly superior framework for combat purposes. However, achieving the same performance with the additional protection requires a subtle perversion of form which gives the bearer an uncanny demeanor.
